statement.p: In 85 of the last 20 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{20}}={0.85}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{20}. \displaystyle{P}={0.85}\cdot{20}={17}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 20-17=3 We round that as requested to 3.
